title: the real nerf no one talks about
body: talon used to be so impactful in the hands of a experienced player. now hes just a walking zoning tool.we all know the gap close nerf was bad cuz a dash is obviously worse the a bling. however why? riot gave talon quite alot of counterplay, way too much but in the mean time they removed his own counterplay options in the proccess. how is he supposed to surive lane against long range mages with a cc like lux or viegar now. old talon had it hard enough but there was skillful executs u can do to somehow beat them early and rip them a new one mid game wich he deseved considering his lane and role. now u cant e out of viegars( this is god awfully annoying) ur not going to get past luxs q, good luck reaching syndra before ur hp bar reaches zero. its enough that w,r and r is nerfed and his passive is now clunky and required to kill but did they really have to take away his counterplay option? now if you somehow manage to reach q range with ur low ms on a mage or adc, ir probably going to get it interuppted by some cc ability anyways since its so slow low range and telegraphed,i can accept thw other changes but i really want his blink back, wich would make his passive smoother and just a little bit faster.... i never lost to a vuegar once on old talon.once once. and i mained him for season 5 and 6 fully. never lost to viegar ahri or akali(lol still havent shes even worse off than talon poor thing) also q is supposed to garuntee an aa and melee q is supposed to give u more dmg, however if u melee q a target moving away u cant aa them after as talon stays in place unlike the leap. i... i just miss old talon i wish i played more matches before they gutted him trying to climb with him feels so bad now....my poor 2 mains shaco and talon, good old time ripping adc buttholes and now its vice versa
